Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.calls

Class AsyncRequestStep<T>

java.lang.Object
oracle.kubernetes.operator.work.Step
oracle.kubernetes.operator.calls.AsyncRequestStep<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
RetryStrategyListener
public class AsyncRequestStep<T>
extends Step
implements RetryStrategyListener
A Step driven by an asynchronous call to the Kubernetes API, which results in a series of callbacks until canceled.
